com.flamingOctoIronman.library.math.matrix

Class MatrixMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.library.math.matrix.MatrixMath

  • public class MatrixMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Class information: This class is used to perform math where the result is a new matrix or where two or more matrices are being operated on All classes are to be static

      Implements the equation row1 = row1 + scalar * row2 in Matrix m based on DecimalFormat precision
